venue.address_1: 107 South St, Ste 6A (btw South Station & Chinatown)
venue.name: David Buck's Loft

item.description:
Happy New Year 2011! Time to Dream BIG!

Kristina Nichols, Boston LOA member, psychotherapist & personal development coach
will guide us through Jack Canfieldâ€™ s Success Principles process & techniques to gain clarity
& step into inspired actions to get to where you want to be in 2011!

(Jack Canfield was one of the featured Master Teachers in The Secret.)

It is our intention to get you ready to take a Quantum Leap in the New Year with:
- creating a clear & concise Life Purpose statement
- creating Breakthrough Goals from your Life Purpose Statement
- how to ask for & get everything you want...from people who can give it to you
- the Rule of 5 that moves you expansively & effortlessly to victories

We want you to feel vibrantly unstoppable with revitalized hope & joy!

**********************************************************
About Kristina Nichols, M.A.
www.kristinamariecoaching.com
email: knichols09@gmail.com

Kristina is a holistic psychotherapist & personal development coach. Her passion is to inspire & empower folks to uncover & express their passion & life purpose with confidence.

**********************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.
We usually provide handouts & have appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your understanding & support!

************************************************************
For parking and directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :
(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com...
(2) Sign in
(3) Scroll down & open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Dream BIG! Why Not?
